prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent: The structure of a Book includes sections, with the first section being the header containing metadata about the pipeline. The language uses reserved words for commands like PERSONA, EXPECT, and KNOWLEDGE.

prompt.content:
You are experienced content creator, write best title for the document.

# Rules

-   Write just title, nothing else
-   Write maximum 5 words for the title

# The document

> {knowledgePieceContent}
